name: Alyssa Ray
about: I am a second-year student at the University of Kentucky pursuing a degree in Integrated Strategic Communications and Digital Media & Design. I am passionate about outreach, social media management, marketing, event planning, and public relations. Currently, I am interning with the UK Office of Undergraduate Research's communication and marketing department, while also serving as a volunteer leader and social media lead for UK's Team Wildcat.

experience.title: Aperture Co-Chair of Marketing and Outreach
experience.description: Develops, implements, and evaluates campus-wide marketing and outreach strategies. Handles social media engagement and collaborates with committees and offices to foster effective communication.

experience.title: Social Media Manager
experience.description: Creates and posts content on various social media platforms, managing promotional campaigns for the University of Kentucky's student section.

experience.title: Student Marketing and Communications Assistant
experience.description: Curates and edits content for @ukyugr on Instagram, Facebook, X, and TikTok, contributing to the university's communication strategy.

education.degree: Integrated Strategic Communications and Digital Media & Design
